Civilians are present in the area, may be armed, and may or may not be in support of Contractor presence in the area of operations.

missions.name: Mountain Man
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with getting rid of a hostile guerrilla presence on the mountains

briefing.old:
**Mountain Man** **Employer**
Lyborian Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Local guerrilla
The local guerrilla is only known to have small arms capacity, and they will attack contractors on sight. They are garrisoning up in the southern mountains of Lybor.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
N/A

INDEPENDENT FORCES:
N/A

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians may be present in the area, but it is unlikely.

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Dangerous cliffsides and extensive mountain ranges. **Mission**
Due to recent events in the Kinney-Kadeny conflict and the violence witnessed during the Mayson Festival, the local guerrillas protesting the new Government of Lybor have been pushed away into the southern mountains of Lybor after continued engagements with contractors and the police.

The Lyborian police does not have sufficient resources to deal with the guerrillas down south, specially given that there are rumours that they are stashing up equipment in order to expand the reach of their forces by further arming their newest recruits.

Contractors have been hired to eliminate and/or arrest all guerrilla fighters in the designated area within the southern mountains by any means necessary, alongside destroying and keeping track of any supply caches they find.

missions.name: Pentest
missions.summary: Contractors attack and destroy the enemy line

briefing.old:
**Pentest** **Employer**
Ardistan's International Affairs Department **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
CSAT
They are equipped with modern military equipment and will engage on sight to defend the line, they are not to be taken lightly. Mainly infantry deployed at the posts.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

INDEPENDENT FORCES:
n/a

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
No civilians present in the area.

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Open terrain, base level fog, bad weather conditions. Plan carefully. **Mission**
The Cerberus Regiment division of CSAT has been deployed to hold the border between Takistan and Ardistan in a sovereignty dispute.

Contractors have been hired to assist in attacking the enemy lines, in hopes to push back the militarily occupied border.

Take down the enemy defensive line by any means necessary. Expect heavy contact and continued gunfire.

Contractors are to ensure the border is clear of CSAT presence. All enemy combatants must be either killed or restrained.

missions.name: Personal Matters
missions.summary: Contractors provide services to quell a local insurgency's influence from emerging in the islands of Tanoa

briefing.mission:
A Tanoan insurgency has been influencing a local movement in one of the islands within the Tanoan province.

Government officials, police, and civilians have been reporting sightings of insurgent forces across the island. Synixe has been provided with somewhat reliable geographical information of where these insurgents most commonly operate. There might be anywhere from one to two areas of enemy presence within each one of the areas of influence.

The insurgents might have gained some of the local's support, which may cause them to be unsupportive, obstructive, or even harmful towards contractors. The insurgency has been stealing food and weapons and reposessing them for their supporters on the island.

Synixe has been contracted to seek out any insurgent forces within the area of operations and either capture or eliminate them.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Secure the 4 Syndikat controlled areas
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Horizon Islands Government
Location: Tanoa

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Syndikat
Location: Tanoa

The local insurgency is present at a few keypoints of the area of operations. They are expected to be equipped with small arms and some technicals and are heavily hostile towards Horizon Islands police and other security forces alike.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Horizon Islands Police

Have roadblocks set up near some of the search areas, but are not patrolling.

missions.name: Public Image
missions.summary: Contractors escort and defend an important figure

briefing.mission:
Contractors have been hired to arrest Hasan Okoye, an important figure of the Kujari region - ID by blue suit. He is expected to be arriving via air at Marwey airfield by 1715.

We are tasked with arresting Okoye, and ensuring he arrives safely at the main villa of Kyari Kinnai. Once there, he is to be left restrained alongside the two businessmen in suits at the main building, within the second floor.

Contractors are not allowed outside of the Area of Operations. Additionally, it has been highly recommended to avoid travelling through the Red Zone, as it is deemed heavily hostile with major enemy presence.

Contractors will maintain security at Kyari Kinnai's villa and fend off any possible attacks until contract expiration time.

No one except for Gendarmerie personnel is allowed entrance to the premises of the villa. Contractors are to prevent anyone to enter uninvited by any means necessary.

Contractors will primarily ensure the villa is safe, and will keep Okoye alive. Secondarily, they shall attempt to keep the two other businessmen alive aswell.

Once contract is completed, Okoye shall be brought back to Synixe's FOB.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Secure Hasan Okoye
- Transport Okoye to Kyari Kinnai
- Hold Okoye for 75 minutes at the meeting point
- Transport Okoye to the airport

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Do not allow the two businessmen to be injured

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
- Remain in the AO
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Jamie Ryan

A Kujarian henchman

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: ISAS

The enemy has been known to resort to guerrilla tactics. Their common practises include execution of civilians, interception of humanitarian workers, stealing supplies, and terrorising towns.

They will likely be equipped with no more than surplus weaponry, light anti-tank launchers, and technicals. It is known that they may disguise as civilians in order to carry out attacks.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: African Gendarmes
Location: Kyari Kinnai, other locations

Will hold defensive positions where they currently are.

missions.name: Retaliation
missions.summary: Contractors investigate a recent raid carried out by an extremist group

briefing.mission:
A raid was carried out this morning by what is believed to be an extremist group, a car bomb was used to destroy a construction site, injuring and killing many of the workers.

The government of Prilivsko has issued a contract for the elimination of said group in the given area of operations.

Suspicious movements in the regions have lead intelligence reports of there being approximately four garrison sites with supply caches in them, although their location has not been pinpointed as of now.

Contractors have been tasked to head over to the attack site and investigate leads to where these sites may be, and once found, to eliminate all insurgent units and destroy all four supply cache sites.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Locate all four suspected garrison sites and destroy all supply caches within them.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
Eliminate any and all hostile forces.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Government of Prilivsko

The Government of Prilivsko has hired Synixe Contractors to weaken a brewing extremist group in the region.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Local insurgents
Location: Spread across different garrison sites

Recent terror attacks have been on the rise in the region of Prilivsko, the motives behind these recent attacks is yet to be known, though a pattern of attacking government-funded constructions has been recognized. It is believed said insurgents are establishing themselves among different sporadic garrison sites in the region by terrorizing locals from their properties.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present in the area.

missions.name: Routine
missions.summary: Contractors assist local forces in maintaining the peace

briefing.old:
**Routine** **Employer**
Government of Africa **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
ISAS
The enemy has been known to resort to guerrilla tactics. Their common practises include execution of civilians, interception of humanitarian workers, stealing supplies, and terrorising towns.

They will likely be equipped no more than surplus weaponry, light anti-tank launchers, and technicals.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, United Nations, African Gendarmes

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians are defenseless against the acts of terrorism ensued by ISAS. Regardless of whether they support us or not, they do not have weapons, and they wish for a better life.

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
N/A **Mission**
Contractors have been hired to maintain the peace and security in the town of Marwey.

It is known that ISAS has been attacking local villages, both by stealing supplies, killing and kidnapping villagers, and by carrying out suicide bomb attacks.

You have been tasked with patrolling the main area of the town of Marwey, keeping it's mosque and market areas safe from any dangers until meeting your contract's duration.

Keep your eyes open, check on suspicious activity, maintain security, and restore the peace.

missions.name: Sundance
missions.summary: Contractors provide security services for a private company amidst a NATO pullout

briefing.mission:
CONTRACTORS are hired to provide security services to VRANA subsidiary keypoints across northeastern Altis, namely THREE (3) AGOLA SOLAR power plants.

Additionally, CONTRACTORS will take care of any ENEMY presence spotted nearby any of the AGOLA SOLAR power plants.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Provide security at each of the THREE (3) designated location for a MINIMUM of FIFTEEN (15) MINUTES to a MAXIMUM of THIRTY (30) MINUTES. Exceptions stated under RESTRICTIONS.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
Eliminate any ENEMY presence nearby any of the AGOLA SOLAR power plants.

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
CONTRACTORS will provide a minimum of FIFTEEN (15) to a maximum of THIRTY (30) MINUTES of protection to each area from the moment of their arrival at each location. The CONTRACT allows EXCEPTIONS to this in part, meaning, a section of the team must still be present at the location should another one splits off for any TASKING, or in case of EMERGENCY.

CONTRACTORS are NOT ALLOWED to leave AGOLA SOLAR premises with the entirety of their team since the moment of their arrival, except for circumstances previously stated as EXCEPTIONS.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
VRANA CORPORATION, AGOLA SOLAR

AGOLA SOLAR workers are present at the power plants performing their usual tasks. They dress in dark red worker coveralls.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
FREEDOM AND INDEPENDENCE ARMY

The FREEDOM AND INDEPENDENCE ARMY (FIA) have been fighting all NATO-aligned and any western-influenced forces and interests in the region of Altis, as such, they have begun to attack multinational companies within the island, leading to threats and attacks against VRANA CORPORATION and its subsidiary companies.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
CIVILIANS are present in the AREA OF OPERATIONS and may or may not be friendly towards CONTRACTORS.

missions.name: An Old Friend's Idea
missions.summary: Contractors must recover two server units

briefing.mission:
There is an ongoing civil war in Altis and during a recent raid on an AAF position, the FIA managed to secure two server units that contain sensitive information.

For the time being they have been unable to crack the encryption, but this will change sooner or later. Therefore Synixe have been hired to move in on the FIA controlled city of Pyrgos and secure both of the server units.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Recover the two server units
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: AAF

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: FIA
Location: Pyrgos

A guerilla force with light armour and weapons, they possess some technicals and emplacements.

missions.name: Black Smoke Rising
missions.summary: Contractors clear camps and destroy weapon caches

briefing.mission:
Recently a guerilla movement has been gaining strength in the region. They've set up several camps along the river bank in preparation for an expansion into other areas.

In order to prevent what could eventually become a military coup on the local government, the CIA has hired Synixe to move along the river bank neutralizing any enemy camps and destroying weapon caches within them.

We've also been provided with some aerial images of the enemy camps.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Clear the enemy controlled areas
- Destroy the weapon caches
briefing.situation:
Terrain in the AO is covered with thick jungles, making traversal difficult outside of the river and paths.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Central Intelligence Agency (CIA)

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Local Militia
Location(s): Several camps along the coast, all of them areas that have been captured by the militia.

They will engage contractors on sight. They posess older weaponry but not a lot of armor.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
No civilian presence in the AO.

missions.name: Classico
missions.summary: Contractors retake an island

briefing.mission:
Six hours ago the island of Utes was officially lost to a group of separatists intent on creating a new government in Chernarus. Obviously the acting government does not want that to happen and has hired Synixe to retake the military facilities in the island.

Therefore contractors must mobilize to the island of Utes and secure all military facilites which include:
- Airfield
- Vehicle Depot
- Barracks
- Northern Base
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Retake all of the military targets on the island
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Chernarussian Government

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Government separatists

They carry a mixture of modern and old Russian weaponry and tend to lack ballistic protection. They do however posses a rather wide range of vehicles.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
The civilian populations still remains on the island, limiting themselves to towns or the surrounding areas.

missions.name: Dark Days
missions.summary: Cripple Takistan's nuclear program

briefing.mission:
Recently negotiation talks with Takistan regarding their impending nuclear weapons program have stalled and intelligence confirms that they're ready to break ground in the development of said weapons.

The country aims to transport its top scientist from a villa in Zargabad as well as a shipment of enriched uranium to an undisclosed location to begin working on nuclear weapons.

Instead of just blowing everyone and everything up the CIA and the DOD have hired Synixe to move into Zargabad and secure everything related to the program.

Contractors are to move into the villa where the scientists are and capture them along with any information related to the program. They are also to move into the airfield where the uranium is awaiting transport and secure it, intelligence suggests that it is being stored in metal containers.

Due to high sensitivity of the project troops have been stationed throughout the city, therefore contractors ar advised to avoid it as much as possible.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Capture the scientists in charge of the program
- Secure any information related to the program
- Secure the enriched uranium that is to be used in the program.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Central Intelligence Agency, US Department Of Defense

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Takistani Army
Location: Airfield, Villa, Zargabad

Their equipment varies between ranks, conscripted troops have been seen to carry cold war era weaponry along with old fatigues and chest rigs.
Their more specialized troops however carry modern weapons along with uniforms and harnesses provided by CSAT. They also posses light vehicles along with some emplacements and the odd APC or IFV.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present in the city of Zargabad as well as the surrounding areas.

missions.name: God's Gonna Cut You Down
missions.summary: Contractors investigate an attack on an anti-poaching group

briefing.mission:
Kujari currently has a huge ongoing problem with poaching and overhunting of the local fauna and like in any place where this is an issue there is a group dedicating to stopping these poaching organizations.

Recently a team of operatives for the anti-poaching organization failed to show up for roll-call, when someone went to check on them in the village where they live they were found massacared along with their family members.

Synixe has been hired to go to the crime scene, investigate and find where the attackers are. Once this is done contractors are to bring the perpetrators to justice and investigate further in order to dismantle the local chapter of the poachers in the region. If possible we should also secure any intel from the poachers regarding buyers, transactions, etc.

We've been informed by the Anti-Poaching organization that if we were to find any of their documents they can provide us with the decryption key needed to decrypt them.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Find the men responsible for the attack and bring them to justice.
- Dismantle the local chapter of poachers in the region.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Secure intel from the poachers regarding buyers, transactions, etc.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Regional Government and Anti-Poaching Organization

They are intersted in protecting the local animal species which are currently being overhunted, with some being even pushed into endangerement and near extinction.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Poacher Gang
Location: Unknown

Eyewitnesses report them as wearing camouflage and harnesses, carrying surplus weapons such as FALs, AKs and Vectors. Due to the heavy sound of machineguns near hunting grounds it is also suspected they have access to 50 cals.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Anti-Poaching Organization
Location: Marwey

They are privately funded and well equipped group. Carrying variants of the XMS rifle, ELBV harnesses and helmets. They are also well trained and most notably use an encryption system to keep reports and information secure.

Name: Local Law Enforcement
Location: Maintaining a perimeter around Gororop

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present throughout the area.

missions.name: Good Luck Babe!
missions.summary: Contractors find and destroy a weapons cache

briefing.mission:
The local government is having problem with an offshoot Taliban militia that recently appeared in the region.

On their own the government and it's armed forces are able to hold their own, but intelligence has revealed that the Taliban have recieved a weapons shipment that once distributed will turne the tide of the conflict.

Synixe has been hired to find the location of the weapons shipment and destroy it before it can be distributed. HUMINT has revealed that the location is encrypted and split up, with the parts and decryption key being held in three separate Taliban controlled villages.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Find the location of the weapons cache
- Destroy the weapons cache
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Kunduz Government

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Taliban
Location: Several villages in the region

Carrying surplus weaponary, they tend to not posses ballistic protection. They are also known to have access to emplacemnts and technicals.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civlians are present in the AO

missions.name: Joker And The Thief
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with recovering stolen weapon shipments

briefing.mission:
Recently a trawler carrying a set of weapon shipments belonging to Laredo Weapons Manufacturing LLC was attacked of the coast of Säkkiluoto.

The attackers made of with several boxes of weaponry, but luckily for our employer they didn't notice the trackers that were placed in the boxes.

Synixe has been hired to recover all of the boxes that were being carried in the trawler. We have been provided with diving gear as well as underwater rifles because it is believed that some boxes may have fallen overboard during the attack.

Be aware that the local militia does not possess the capabilities to attack a moving boat, so whoever attacked it is gonna be better equipped.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Recover the stolen weapon shipments.
Consisting of:
 - 6 boxes of basic weapons
 - 2 boxes of special weapons
 - 3 boxes of launchers
 - 4 boxes of grenades
 - 3 boxes of explosvies
 - 2 boxes of support items
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Laredo Weapons Manufacturing LLC

They were transporting a set of weapon shipments when the boat that was carrying them was attacked.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Local Militia
Location: Unknown

A local militia keen on overthrowing the government. They utilize a mix of modern and old soviet weaponry as well as possessing a limited amount of emplacements.
It is believed that they do not possess the capabilites to have attacked the boat carrying the weapons, so the attacker was probably someone else.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Location: No civilian presence expected in the AO

missions.name: Lonely Boy
missions.summary: Contractors capture a wanted man

briefing.mission:
The local president, Raúl Marquez, is wanted by the international court for crimes against humanity.

Synixe has been tasked with capturing and extracting him before he flees the country. According to HUMINT he is still at the presidential house in the outskirts of Suurkylä.

Contractors have been provided a photo of Marquez from his presidential inaguration.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Capture Raúl Marquez before he flees the country.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: International Court

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Local Armed Forces
Location: Presidential House

Lightly armored with modern russian weaponry. Known to use emplacements from time to time.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civlians are present throughout the AO.

missions.name: Lost In Transit
missions.summary: Contractors recover a stolen weapons shipment

briefing.mission:
Recently a convoy transporting weapons belonging to the Korsac Defense Legion (KDF) was attacked near the town of Zerno. Synixe has been hired to investigate the location of the attack and find out where the weapons have been taken.

Once found the weapons are to be recovered and brought back to the contractor's FOB.

The transport was carrying:
- 4 crates of explosives
- 1 crate of basic weapons
- 1 crate of special weapons
- 1 crate of launchers
- 1 crate of grenades
- 1 crate of basic ammo
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Recover the stolen weapon shipment.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Korsac Government

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Korsac Separatists
Location: Unknown

They carry modern soviet weaponry and usually don't have a lot when it comes to ballistic protection. They have a couple of technicals to their disposal.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present throughout the AO.

missions.name: Make It Wit Chu
missions.summary: Contractors must extract a journalist from an enemy base

briefing.mission:
A week ago, John Mankiew, an american reporter who was working for AAN disappeared while covering the ongoing civil war in the region. Mankiew disappeared while "illegally" documenting activities in the separatist controlled Northern region.

HUMINT has revealed that Mankiew is being held captive in F.O.B Abo, HQ for the separatist forces. AAN is paying Synixe to mobilize north and extract Mankiew back to friendly territory. A chopper will be waiting at the airfield in order to fly Mankiew home.

Since we are moving north, loyalist forces have asked us to give them a hand by sabotaging as many assets in F.O.B. Abo as possible. AAN has also provided us with a picture of Mankiew from his last news transmission, said picture will be available in a screen within your F.O.B.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Extract John Mankiew back to friendly territory.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Sabotage as many enemy assets in F.O.B Abo as possible
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: AAN News

Independent broadcaster that has provided news coverage in worldwide events since it's creation in the early 2000s.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Separatist Forces
Location: Northern Region of the AO, starting after Vinjesvingen.

They possess modern russian weaponry and vehicles, with superior firepower when it comes to the Loyalists.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Loyalist Forces
Location: Southern Region of the AO, up until Vinjesvingen.

They possess modern russian weaponry and vehicles, what they lack in firepower they make up for in vehicle availability.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians roam the AO.

missions.name: My God Is The Sun
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with hunting down enemy artillery

briefing.mission:
A civil war has been running in the region, fueled by a desire to control the local production of crude oil. Three months in the scales are about to tip, apparently the opposing side has obtained a set of Zamak MRLs which they intend to use to attack several friendly controlled sites throughout the region.

Our friendlies are unable to muster up the manpower to hunt down and destroy these trucks and have hired Synixe to do it. The objective is to move into the AO and find and destroy those trucks.

HUMINT has provided us with photos of what the targets look like and has revealed the approximate locations of the three trucks, the locations are as follows.

- In the valleys west of Oum Ali.
- In the area near Ben Guerrir.
- In the area near Tildjen.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Locate the three artillery Zamak MRLs and destroy them
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Loyalist forces

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Separatist forces
Location: Throughout the AO

They possess a variety of weaponry typical of African militias and tend to lack ballistic protection. Due to the terrain they have difficulties using vehicles, however they make up for this with weapon emplacements.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present in the region, they mainly stick to towns.

missions.name: One Last Breath
missions.summary: Contractors deliver supplies in preparation for an AAF assault

briefing.mission:
For the past five months a civil war has been raging in Altis. The AAF, which are protecting the ruling government, have been fighting the FIA after a failed coup attempt.

This conflict is about to come to an end, with the AAF having pushed the FIA to Oreokastro and the surrounding mountains; both sides know all it takes is for one final assault for it all to end and that is what the AAF intend to do.

However due to a lack in manpower caused by peace keeping in unruly towns, the AAF have hired Synixe to deliver the supplies needed for a final assault.

Contractors are being tasked with delivering supplies to FOB Ares and Outposts Boreas, Chronos and Dionysus. Additionally we are being tasked with clearing Landing Point Eros and delivering supplies there so that an SF team can neutralize enemy assets in Thronos when the assault starts.

Due to the AAF's worry that we may clue the FIA off that an attacl is near, we have been prohibited from using any aerial assets wether they are helicopters or UAVs.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Deliver supplies to FOB Ares (3x vehicle ammo, 1x launchers, 1x ammo, 1x equipment, 1x explosives)
- Deliver supplies to Outpost Boreas (1x ammo, 1x greandes)
- Deliver supplies to Outpost Chronos (1x ammo, 1x greandes)
- Deliver supplies to Outpost Dionysus (1x launchers)
- Clear Landing Point Eros and deliver supplies to it (1x weapons, 1x equipment, 1x explosives)

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
Usage of any air assets is strictly prohibited
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Altian Government
Location: Kabala, Altis

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Freedom and Independence Army (FIA)
Location: Oreokastro, Altis

The FIA are currently desperate and on the losing end of the war, so they'll do anything to try and survive. 
They usually lack ballistic protection and have some vehicles and emplacements at their disposal.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Altis Armed Forces (AAF)
Location: FOB Ares, Outpost Boreas, Outpost Chronos, Outpost Dionysus

The AAF are about to win the civil war, however even though they have the technological advantage they are low on manpower since most of their forces are busy keeping the peace.
They posses modern weaponry and varying vehicle platforms.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians will be present in towns, but not near military sites

missions.name: Peace of Mind
missions.summary: Contractors must defuse explosives before they go off

briefing.mission:
Twenty four hours ago the FIA orchestrated a surprise attack and took over military and industrial sites all over north eastern Altis. They did this with the intention of getting the current government to dissolve so that they can step in and take power.

FIA has demanded the government to dissolve and has publicized that they have installed explosives on the sites they took. Starting 15:30 they are gonna start blowing them up one by one every 30 minutes until they get what they want. They say they will start with the Radar Base, followed by the Power Plant, then the Military Facility and finally the Solar Plant.

Needless to say the government does not intend to step down, but at the same time they cannot let this happen since it would severely cripple Altis's industrial and military capabilities. Therefore they have hired Synixe to sort out the situation before it's too late.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Secure the sites
- Defuse the explosives before they go off
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Altian Government
Location: Kavala

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Freedom And Independence Army
Location: Radar Base, Power Plant, Military Facility, Solar Plants

The Freedom And Indepence Army (FIA) are a revolutinary group that intend to take power from the current government. They are lightly armoured and are equipped with surplus AAF weaponry. They are also known to have access to technicals and emplacements.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present throughout the AO.

missions.name: Rot Away
missions.summary: Contractors sabotage CSAT assets

briefing.mission:
CSAT currently has a garrison of troops stationed in the Stratis Air Base and a small vehicle depot near the town of Agia Marina.

NATO has tasked Synixe with destroying key enemy assets in these locations so that the base can later be easily taken over and occupied by allies.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Destroy any CSAT assets in the target areas. These may include:

- Airplanes
- Helicopters
- Vehicles
- Radar
- Batteries

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
Try and keep infrastrucutre intact so that the bases can later be occupied.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: NATO

The North Atlantic Treaty Organization is an intergovernmental military alliance of 32 member states—30 European and 2 North American.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: CSAT
Location: Stratis Air Base and vehicle depot near Agia Marina

The Canton Protocol Strategic Alliance Treaty is a military and economic alliance that comprises of Eastern nations, serving as a direct counterpart to NATO. They possess modern weaponry and armor to match that of NATO, even surpassing them in some aspects.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: NATO
Location: Not in the area

They possess common western weaponry, they will not be directly aiding us in combat.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Location: The island of Stratis
Civilians are not allowed in the target areas, so you don't have to worry about them when clearing.

missions.name: Safe European Home
missions.summary: Contractors execute a kill or capture order

briefing.mission:
During Na Trioblóidí a young gunsmith by the name of Michael Murphy became notorious for providing weapons of impecable quality to the IRA, once the Good Friday Agreement took place Murphy disappeared off the face of the earth. However, his weapons kept appearing all over the globe in several conflicts and massacres, leading to him being wanted by both the British government and INTERPOL.

Recently a Vanguard PMC fireteam were found to be carrying weapons made by Murphy and thanks to SIGINT and HUMINT the British have been able to determine that Murphy is operating out of Hellanmaa.

Synixe has therefore been contracted to find Murphy and execute a kill or capture order. Thanks to the word of civlians we know that Vanguard has extensive logistical operations on the Eastern side of the region, which leads us to believe that Murphy is probably in that area overseeing the manufacturing and assembly of weapons.

Alternatively contractors could mount an assault on the Vanguard F.O.B, which is established in the Jankos Industrial Area, and attempt to find any information on Murphy's whereabouts.

Contractors have also been provided with a computer generated photo that recreates what Murphy would look like in present day based on photos of his younger self.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Kill or capture Michael Murphy
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: British Government and INTERPOL.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Vanguard PMC
Location: Jankos Industrial Area

Vanguard possess diverse types of modern weaponry ranging from AK-12s to MXs. They are also well equipped when it comes to ballistic protection, donning plate carriers and helmets.
<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present throughout the AO.

missions.name: Stuck In The Middle With You
missions.summary: Contractors must help after a helicopter crash

briefing.mission:
At 0100 a helicopter that was transporting CTRG operatives, who were escorting a data terminal, was shot down. Contractors must move to the crash area and find the location of the operatives and the terminal.

Once this is done contractors must destroy the data terminal to prevent the enemy from accessing its contents and rescue the people involved in the crash. Should some of the people involved already be dead contractors must extract the bodies for repatriation.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Destroy the data terminal that was being transported.
- Rescue everyone involved in the helicopter crash, if they are already dead extract their bodies for repatriation.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: NATO

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Taliban Militia

They carry mostly old weaponry and do not usually carry vests. Can easily be identified by their attire.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: CTRG Operatives
Location: Unknown

Unknown appeareane. Will most likely have western equipment on them.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
No Civilians are present in the AO.

missions.name: Symphony of Destruction
missions.summary: Contractors find chemical sources

briefing.old:
**Symphony of Destruction** **Employer**
Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Local insurgents
Attack any forces on sight

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, CIA recovery team

INDEPENDENT FORCES:
Livonian Defense Force

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians are expected outside of the quarantined area.

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Terrain in the AO is covered by forests and can be mountainous in certain parts. **Mission**
Recently during a private research endeavor a chemical detector started going off when approaching an area in the South Western corner of the AO. Upon further investigation it was revealed that the measurements from the detector align with those of chemical weapons.

The CIA has gotten wind of this and has hired Synixe to venture into the area where the signals were detected and recover any and all causes of these signals. Once they are recovered they are to be taken to a drop off site where a CIA helicopter is awaiting to get them off the country.

CIA has gotten in contact with the neighboring LDF and has had them quarantine the area, so no civilians are expected in the location where the signals are coming from. They've also managed to provide us with Chemical Detectors which are not as strong as the ones that were first used to detect the signals, but should still go off when within 100 meters of the source. They've also given us gas masks, they don't think there should be any risk of contractors dying from these sources so the decision to wear them is up to the contractor.

missions.name: The Times They Are A-Changin'
missions.summary: Contractors recover a captured CIA asset

briefing.mission:
Recently a CIA asset working in deep cover as a cargo pilot in Tanoa failed to check in with his handler. This asset, Ruru Naituyaga, is believed to have been capture by operating Vanguard PMC forces.

Synixe has been hired to mobilize to the island Vangaurd is currently operating from to then find and rescue Naituyaga. Intelligence has detected that a trawler registered to a Vanguard shell company is headed towards the island, so it is suspected that they intend to extract Naituyaga by sea.

Additionally, we've been asked to if possible deal with a set of mortar emplacements that Vanguard has distributed throughout the island. Intelligence suggests that there are 3 emplacements around the island.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Recover the captured CIA operative

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Destroy the enemy mortar emplacements
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Central Intelligence Agency (CIA)
Location: Langley, Virginia

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Vanguard PMC
Location: Island on the Tanoan archipelago

Well armed, trained and equipped. They have forces all over the island.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Civilians are present throughout the AO, since kicking out the population of the island would draw even more attention.

missions.name: Veridis Quo
missions.summary: Assault the MDF military island and neutralize key locations

briefing.mission:
Recently the MDF has been sizing up its armed forces with the help of CSAT provided assets. NATO sees this as a threat in the region and has therefore hired Synixe to diminish the MDF's capabilities.

Contractors must move into the MDF military island and neutralize key locations that are imperative for the MDF's operations.

These locations are: An HQ, a firing range, a vehicle depot, a comms station and some docks that are used to store boats.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Neutralize the key locations throughout the military island

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Destroy as many assets as possible
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: NATO

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Malden Defence Forces
Location: Military Island

Lightly armored, carrying 5.56 rifles. In possession of some CSAT vehicular assets.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
No civilians present in the AO.

missions.name: Welcome To Paradise
missions.summary: Contractors aid NATO in a push against CSAT

briefing.mission:
Recently CSAT has made a push into the island of Malden, attempting to seize control of it. Since they currently lack manpower to fully control the island they've settled with controling the outer portions.

NATO has hired Synixe to assist them in pushing back CSAT, while they fight on the eastern side of the island Synixe will have to clear positons on the western side.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Clear CSAT positons in Lolisse, Goisse, Vigny and Arette
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: NATO

The North Atlantic Treaty Organization is an intergovernmental military alliance of 32 member states—30 European and 2 North American.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: CSAT
Location: Towns on the outer portions of Malden.

The Canton Protocol Strategic Alliance Treaty is a military and economic alliance that comprises of Eastern nations, serving as a direct counterpart to NATO. They possess modern weaponry and armor to match that of NATO, even surpassing them in some aspects.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: NATO
Location: Moray airbase and USS freedom.

They possess common western weaponry, they will not be directly aiding us in combat.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Location: Central parts of Malden.
Any civilians in the island have been pushed into the central part of it by CSAT.

missions.name: DEADEND
missions.summary: Re-captured the FOB and clear-out the surrounding area

briefing.mission:
The Norwegian government has hired us to deal with a group of Pro-Russian Separatists that have seized an FOB and an experimental T-100 tank. The government is wary of sending in their own troops and giving the Separatists the publicity they so badly want.

We need to put down this little rebellion quickly and quietly and restore order to this blocked off region.

Here is a list of assets that were at the FOB at the time the Separatists took control;
- T-100
- BMP-100
- BM-2 Stalker
- MI-53 (Attack Helicopter)
- Various other vehicles, mostly transport

It is advised to bring a lot of AT/AA to deal with these threats.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Recapture the FOB

- Destroy\capture the T-100 tank.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Clear out all Separatists
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name:  Norwegian GOVERMENT
Location: Norway

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Pro-Russian Separatists
Location: Vinjesvingen, Norway

Not happy with Sweden and Finland joining NATO and trying to disrupt military and government operations all over the Region. They're low on funds and maybe looking for ways to Humiliate the Government and make a quick buck. 

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name:  Norwegian Citizens
Location: Vinjesvingen, Norway

Have been trapped by the Separatists closing all the main roads out of the area.

missions.name: It's the AMPs that kill you
missions.summary: Separatists have siezed control of a power station and refiney

briefing.mission:
While on a training exercise in Korsac, Synixe heard shots nearby. We have now learned that Separatist's have captured a nearby Power Station and Oil Refinery and are holding them to ransom.

Being the closest assets, Synixe has been tasked with eliminating the Separatist's and restoring Power and Resources to the area.

The Separatist's are known to use hit and run tactics.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Recapture the Power Plant
- Recapture the Refinery

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Separatists
Location: Korsac

Reports show that they moved with speed using several modes of transport. this inculdes a BMP, trucks, UAVs and several .50 cal technicals.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Present in the AO

missions.name: Bomu Garu
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with clearing a city of explosive ordanance

briefing.mission: Synixe has been hired by the Federal Iraqi Government to support their efforts to re-take the city of Al Salman from forces belonging to the resurgent Islamic State (ISIS). This will be the third battle for the city in under 6 months. With both forces spent, Synixe has been brought in to supplement the Iraqi National Army. Additionally, Synixe has been hired for it's expertise in EOD. The Iraqi army believes that Al Salman can be re-taken however, intel reports suggest ISIS has mined key routes within and around the city. Synixe is to dispose of this ordnance while keeping damage to the cities infrastructure to a minimum. The disposal of all mines within the AO will allow for the Iraqi Army to bring in heavy equipment, and open up key logistical routes to other AO's
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Locate and remove all explosive ordanance within the AO

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Neutralize all ISIS forces within and around Al Salman



<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
- Dispose of the mines without blowing them up on densely populated routes
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Federal Government of Iraq

The Iraqi government is once again battling an ISIS insurgency. ISIS has popped up through out the country side, gaining quick, but short lasting victories over the Federal government. 

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: ISIS
Location: Al Salman

Born again from the crucible of fire that is the ongoing hostilities in the Levant, ISIS has achieved several key victories over the Iraqi government, including at Al Salman. However, their hold over the city has been short lived, as their two initial victories quickly turned to hasty retreats. They are hoping this third capture of the city will be all that is needed. ISIS forces in the AO have been seen equipped with last generation small arms, shoulder mounted weapons, and the occasional light wheeled asset.  

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Iraqi Army
Location: Abd al-Karim Qasim Air Base, and at the north city limites of Al Salaman

The Iraqi Army has taken up positions just north of Salman. The forces deployed to this AO have been weakened by consecutive battles for the city. 


<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name: Iraqi Civilians
Location: East Al Salman

The majority of the population of Al Salman has evacuated to refugee camps. However, a sizeable population remain in East Salman

missions.name: Byelomorye
missions.summary: Contractors must extract hostages and defuse explosives

briefing.mission: The Fuerzas Armadas Revolucionarias Socialistas has attacked the Columbian state of Isla del pájaro azul, took a number of hostages, as well as placed explosives on the island's hydroelectric dam. The group is threatening to execute the hostages and blow the dam if the state does not immediately release the groups imprisoned leaders by 0830hrs. Synixe has been hired to resolve this matter.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Rescue all hostages and escort them back to FOB Roger de Flor
- Defuse all explosives planted at Presa Alta

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Locate and destroy the enemy motar position
- Clear Station Mike-69 of all enemy forces
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Columbian Government
Location: Nation Wide

Given the untimely deadline given to it by the rebels, and issues in supplying it's own forces, the national government has reached out to Synixe to assist in revolving this matter.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Fuerzas Armadas Revolucionarias Socialistas
Location: Presa Alta, and surrounding areas

An armed socialist revolutionary group which has a considerable supply of weaponry and manpower at it's disposal. They are equipped with 90's - mid 2000's small arms, some light-med CSW's, and possibly light APC's. It is believed they have planted at least 4 explosives

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Columbian Army and State Police
Location: Outside the AO

Both the army and state police lack the manpower and assets to combat the rebels. All of their attempts at dislodging them have so far failed.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name: Columbian civilians

Many civilians are still present throughout the AO, though a good number were able to evac prior to the take-over.

missions.name: Leap Frog
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with disrupting a cartel

briefing.mission:
Hired by the Direction générale de la Sécurité extérieure (DGSE), Synixe contractors are to rendevous with
an operative they have imbedded within the Maxence Cartel to which has been plauging the Republic of Palau
through it's aggressive drug trafficking and other criminal actions. The rendevous point is in the village of Tanjung.

Agent 'Petit frère', the DGSE operative imbedded within the cartel, has information on priority targets.
Rendevous with 'Petit frère', extract them, and carry-out action on the target's they have identified.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Rendevous with Agent 'Petit frère' in the village of Tanjung and extract them
- Carry-out action against the targets they have identified


<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
There may be civilians within the AO. Limit civilian casualties at all costs

Location: Monyet Airfield

The DGSE has been operating out of the Republic of Palau (RoP) for the last number of years, aiding the Police Nationale Républicaine (PNR) combat the rise of the growing Maxence cartel 

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Maxence Cartel
Location: Unknown

A nation wide cartel run by the notorious Maxence Family. The cartel has been terrorizing the populace of the island nation through it's violent acts and massive drug trafficking empire

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>

A small contigent of Legion personnel are stationed at Monyet Airfield

<font color='#139120'>INDEPENDENT FORCES</font>

The PNR is struggling to combat the forces of the Maxence cartel. They are underequipped, undermanned, and lack the support of the political establishment to combat the cartel

Citizens of the RoP have been terrorized by the Maxence for years now. Many have fallen to substance abuse and the violent actions of the Maxence cartel

missions.name: They're Gone
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with rescuing hostage

briefing.mission:
Corruption and scandal during the 2025 Chadian national elections resulted in the country once again becoming de-stabilized. 

FACT (Front pour l’alternance et la concorde au Tchad), having grown in size and capability over the years, took advantage of the situation and declared war on the national government. 

NATO, not willing to become involved in yet another foray into Africa, urged France to get involved to which they did. 

Since 2025, France has propped up the national government through force of arms. However, the operation quickly became a quagmire with public settlement back home turning sour to the idea of staying involved.

With France currently drawing down it's forces in theatre, Jem'heda'r Industries has looked to Synixe to rescue a number of it's workers who were abducted from the companies property around Djebel Hamra.

The PMC firm to whom had taken the initial security contract for Jem'heda'r shared with Synixe that their operators had reported fire from heavy weaponry and motar fire prior to going dark.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Rescue the hostages taken from the Djebel Hamra work site and return them to FOB Michel Ney

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Destroy or capture the enemy motars.

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
- Due to the instability in the region, as well as the myriad factions contesting ownership within the province, contractors must stay within the AO.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Jem'hada'r Industries
Location: Djebel Hamra work site

Jem'hada'r had dozens of employees, as well as a rival PMC firm deployed at their work site located near Djebel Hamra when it was attacked. From information they have gathered, 2-4 hostages remain alive. 

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: FACT (Front pour l’alternance et la concorde au Tchad)
Location: Unknown, but likely throughout Ouaddaï province

Of the myriad factions fighting the national government, FACT is by far the largest and most coordinated. FACT's successes can be attributed to receiving a large amount of funding and equipment from CSAT nations, as well as receiving inumerable volunteers from across Africa and the Middle East. 

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: French Foriegn Legion
Location: FOB Michel Ney

The Foriegn Legion has a token force, at best, deployed at FOB Michel Ney. they currently drawing down and are expected to leave the country in the coming months. It is doubtful they could offer any meaningful assistance.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name: Chadian Civilians
Location: Throughout Ouaddaï province

With refugee camps operating well beyond their means, countless civilians within Ouaddaï province remain.

missions.name: eine Mehrheitsbeteiligung
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with disrupting an insurgency's drug network

briefing.mission: Synixe has been contracted by the Folkrepubliken Svea to aid them in their fight against the Ättens Väktare, an insurgency group which has been unrelating in their attacks on the national government. Ättens Väktare has fueled their insurgency through creating a sophisiticated drug production and distribution system. Western and eastern european nations have recorded record levels of illegal narcotics trafficked within their borders due to this epidemic. While the national government deals with the group elsewhere, Synixe will deploy to the AO and destroy Ättens Väktare's drug empire. The National government has also asked that Synixe destroy the group's rotary air-wing, along with a recently arrived arms shipment, though the drugs are the primary objective.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Destroy or retrieve Ättens Väktare's stash of drugs

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Destroy the group's new helicopter wing
- Destroy the recently arrived arms shipment
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Folkrepubliken Svea
Location: Saxhult flygfält

The national government has been fighting this insurgency for years now and the public is demanding a swift end to this bitter conflict in their countries history. 

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Ättens Väktare
Location: On and around Stora Färgen

Ättens Väktare has found itself a welcome home to many of Europe's radicals, specifically those with white nationalist leanings. Many of their ranks have prior military experience in the nations of Europe, primarily the Bundeswehr, Bundesheer, Forsvaret, and Wojsko Polskie. With the proceeds from their drug trafficking, they have been able to arm them selves with modern weaponry and some light vehicles. They have also recently purchased a small wing of rotary craft, some of which may be armed. Synixe can expect the majority of the groups forces to be centered around the area's ports and airfields. 

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Svea Folkförsvar
Location: Saxhult flygfält

The armed forces of the nation are tied up elsewhere handling the insurgency. Do not expect much, if any, reinforcements from their forces in the AO. 


<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name: Medborgare i Folkrepubliken Svea
Location: Whole AO

Many citizens remain living in the AO, though they have given a wide berth to Ättens Väktare

missions.name: Belly of the Beast
missions.summary: Contractors eliminate enemy cell leader

briefing.mission:
Approx. 5 hours ago, government forces evacuated the city of Farabad due to mass killings of law enforcement and civil unrest. And approx. 2 hours ago, terrorist cells within the city culled all civilain leadership behind the rioting and quelled the civil unrest, taking control of Farabad.

This is believed to be the work of Sergei Badawi, a long-time leader of an ISIS in Syria who escaped into Farabad as US SOCOM cannot follow him easily into Takistan. He is believed to be advising the insurgents, who call themselves the Farabadi Freedom Legion (Anglicized).

Synixe Contractors had snuck into the city before the fall, but are now stuck in the middle of the enemy controlled city. However, Badawi's projected location, as well as the center of FFL operations in the city, is right next to the Contractor's safehouse and should be free of civilians. Your vehicles are located in the courtyard.

To get out, a VIP with an ION security detail has worked a deal with the Takistani government to leave a small compound on the outskirts of the city untouched in the following chaos. Contractors will move to the compound where they will be protected when the Takistani Army moves in to retake the city.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Eliminate Sergei Badawi
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: US Department Of Defense

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Farabadi Freedom Legion
Location: Marked Target Area and across Farabad

- Lightly armored fighters that use numbers and massed fire to move against enemies. Also known to use up armored vehicles and technicals to push their enemies into CQB.

- Their control of Farabad is light, with not many areas being fully manned other than their headquarters in the center of the city, but is propelled by their so-far brutal treatment of the Shia population of the city. 

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: ION Services
Location: Extraction Compound (Marked On Map)

Hired as security forces for VIPs. Will not come to help.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>

Majority of the population still lives inside the city. Allegiance is unknown due to how recently FFL has taken over, but CIVPOP shouldn't get in the way of contractor operations in the area.

missions.name: Arabella
missions.summary: Defend the FOB until help arrives

briefing.mission:
The Royal Suonkomar Armed Forces (RSAF) have been bogged down in a deadly war of attrition against a prolific Wahhabi Jihadist militant group in South East Asia.

The RSAF has hired Synixe to help train their forces and to act as military advisors. However local intelligence has gained new intel which suggests a massive attack on RSAF forces stationed at FOB Emery.

Synixe Contractors are the closest to FOB Emery and RSAF have requested we help defend the FOB until they can muster enough reinforcements.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Defend FOB Emery until reinforcements arrive

Armed Forces of Suonkomar Sahav.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>

missions.name: Foxtrot Uniform Charlie Kilo
missions.summary: Escort a convoy

briefing.mission: Synixe has been hired to provide logistical support and protection to a Livonian supply convoy, on it's way to a joint NATO-Korsac military exercise.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Escort the convoy to VRP Whiskey

<font color='#E3D310'>IMPORTANT NOTES</font>
Synixe will be provided with a logistics support vehicle and a mobile command vehicle.

- The mobile command vehicle is required to command the convoy
- Commands consist of "Move Convoy", "Stop Convoy", "Kill Engines" and "Clear"
- The convoy will halt at each waypoint, marked on the map
- The convoy will require a "Clear" order, to continue past a waypoint
- The logistics support vehicle can be used to provide fuel and spare parts for field repairs
briefing.situation:
NATO's sphere of influence is ever growing in Eastern Europe, attracting Korsac as a prospective member. The Korsac Defense Force will be hosting joint exercises with NATO member states. The United States, United Kingdom, Germany and Livonia will take part in these exercises.

The LDF have volunteered to provide supplies and material for the duration of the exercise and has prepared a convoy to be moved to the area of operations.
Synixe has been hired to provide protection and logistical support to the convoy.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Livonian Defense Force (LDF)
Location: Throughout the AO

The LDF has six HEMTT trucks, stocked with supplies, ready to leave the gas station at 7 A.M. Other LDF forces are on exercise with other NATO and Korsac forces near VRP Whiskey.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Pro-Russian Seperatists
Location: Throughout the AO

The seperatists despise the West and have been pushing for a more Russian-aligned government. When democracy didn't go their way during the last election, they became more violent. They are known to use guerilla and ambush tactics, are lightly armored, armed with surplus weapons. Numbers unknown.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: NATO, KDF
Location: VRP Whiskey

US, UK, German, Livonian and Korsac forces are on exercise around VRP Whiskey.

Name: Korsac Military Police
Location: Throughout the AO

Korsac Military Police are scattered around the AO to provide security in the region.

<font color='#139120'>INDEPENDENT FORCES</font>

Location: Throughout the AO

Several industrial sites in Korsac have armed private security.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name: Civilians
Location: Throughout the AO

There are many civilians present.

missions.name: Patron Saint
missions.summary: Destroy a downed UAV

briefing.mission:
After weeks of continuous rainfall, Prilivsko has been at risk for extreme flooding. Yesterday, the dykes broke. Local law enforcement was unable to evacuate all the civilians in the area.

IDAP preemptively set up an aid station to help with relief efforts, but are unable to reach all those in need of help. 

The USS Freedom deployed a UAV to help observe and provide assistance with information gathering for local law enforcement. However, the UAV suffered a catastrophic malfunction after a lightning strike; causing it to crash land in the DMZ.

Prilivsko is a demilitarized zone in the Green Sea region, acting as a buffer between Chernarus and Russia. As per international agreements, a foreign third-party oversees the security of the region. The foreign third-party in question is Belarus, a junior member of CSAT.

Synixe has been hired to destroy the wreckage of the crashed UAV.

This is a terribly embarrassing situation for NATO that could potentially lead to international repurcussions if not dealt with discreetly.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Find and destroy the crashed UAV

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Escort rescued civilians to Camp Nicholas
- Avoid confrontation with the Belarussian Armed Forces
briefing.situation:
Roads have been disrupted by the flooding and many homes are under water. Synixe will have to use boats to travel around. Keep a look out for trapped civilians.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: NATO Special Operation Command Europe (SOCEUR)
Location: Stuttgart, Germany

Based at Patch Barracks near Stuttgart, Germany, SOCEUR's function is to plan for use of Special Operations forces within EUCOM's area of responsibility, employ the forces, and assess whether they are achieving the desired results.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Belarussian Armed Forces
Location: Prilivsko

The Belarussian Armed Forces are patrolling the region. They consider themselves peacekeepers but completely disregard the safety and the peace of the local populace.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: HMS Vigilance
Location: Kotlina, Prilivsko

The HMS Vigilance is a stealth destroyer of the British Royal Navy. It's mulitnational crew is deployed around the world to assist in special and clandestine operations of the CTRG and other Special Operations Groups.

<font color='#139120'>Looters</font>
Name: Looters
Location: -UNKNOWN-

Several locals affected by the flooding have taken up arms in attempt to loot and scavange amongst what's leftover. They are potentially hostile to others intruding on their territory.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>

Many locals are trapped in the region, seeking refuge on whatever highground they can find. If and when you run into civilians, the local authorities ask you rescue and escort them to IDAP Camp Nicholas.

missions.name: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
missions.summary: Intel gathering, behind enemy lines

briefing.mission:
The Russian Federation is in Virolahti performing demonstrations with experimental military hardware with the intent to sell.
Synixe is tasked with collecting intelligence on said hardware, Contractors will be provided vehicles for transportation and a surveillance van capable of listening in on communications and hacking into data points from a distance.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Obtain photographic evidence of new experimental UGV's
- Obtain flight logs and install a backdoor at Virojoki Airport
- Obtain photographic evidence of new experimental tank
- Obtain test results from the railgun demonstration
- Obtain photographic evidence of (possible) sales meet(s)
- Gain access and install backdoor to Virolahti's government mainframe

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Hide any Synixe involvement
- Hide any CIA / US / NATO involvement
briefing.situation:
The border region of Virohlati has long been disputed between the Russian Federation and Finland. Recently, the local government shocked the international community by hosting a referendum, proposing independence from Finland. This was fueled by the Russian backed "Truth Party". Russia's involvement has sparked outrage.

The Russian Federation and CSAT have decided to help enforce Virolahti's independence from Finland by deploying a multilateral "peacekeeping" force to the region. Troops from Russia, Belarus and Iran have arrived to support the local police forces, and as a show of force to Finland and it's NATO allies.

The transition, although shocking, has gone relatively peaceful as CSAT and Russian forces perform live-fire military exercises to increase readiness.
Virolahti's local government has been looking to build up it's very own security forces; opening up the floor for military procurement and hardware demonstrations. The Russian Federation will be showcasing state-of-the-art military hardware with the intent to sell to Virolahti and CSAT.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: CIA
Location: Langley, Virginia

The Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) has hired Synixe to gather intel on experimental Russian military hardware.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: CSAT, Russian Federation and Virolahti police
Location: Throughout the region

CSAT and the Russian Federation have shown up in force in Virolahti, to support the local police. You can expect a mix of military and police protecting vital areas and exercising throughout the region.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name: Virolahti locals

Civilians live in the region. Because the transfer of power has gone relatively smooth, not many people have been displaced.

INSERT YOUR MISSION DESCRIPTION HERE

missions.name: Finnishing Ascension
missions.summary: Canadaian Special Forces deploy to Finland

briefing.mission:
Finland, along with other countries, have decided to join NATO.

As part of the negotiations that were made public, a backdoor deal was made with Canada.

The "Santa Claus Village" in Rovaniemi, Finland, has been brazenly spreading misinformation about Santa Claus.
Indoctrinating the youth of Finland to believe that Santa Claus is Finnish, and not Canadian, as the truth is.

As part of the deal, Finland has agreed to prevent the village from continuting to operate.
Finnish Police attempted to close the site peacefully, but were met with resistance.
A standoff has ensued.

On December 25th, 2024, Santa was doing his rounds, when he received anti-air fire from the village. A massive escalation to the conflict.

The Canadian Government is immediately deploying CANSOFCOM to assist in the operation to shut down the village.

Santa was able to expertly evade the fire and continue his mission, but several packages address to children fell from his sleigh.

It is up to JTF2 to remove the threat, eliminate their fake "Santa", secure the fortress, and deliver the packages to the children of Finland.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Secure the winter fortress
- Eliminate the "Santa" prenteder
- Deliver the 5 intercepted packages to the courier
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Canadian Armed Forces, CANSOFCOM
Location: Dwyer Hill, Ontario

[REDACTED]

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Santa Claus Village
Location: Rovaniemi, Finland

Indoctrinated extremists that refuse to accept the truth about Santa Claus.

A mix of senior citizen volunteers and minimum wage 19-25 year olds "taking a gap year".

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Santa Claus
Location: [REDACTED]

Completed his mission and not in the AO.

<font color='#139120'>INDEPENDENT FORCES</font>
Name: Finnish Armed Forces

Will not interfere with the operation unless provoked.

missions.name: Halloween 2024
missions.summary: Contractors must investigate a facility

briefing.mission:
Recently an explosion was heard coming from a secret research facility belonging to an international corporation that works on anything from weapons to medicine.

The purpose of this task force is to move into the facility and investigate what happened. It is suspected that aside from working on weapons technology the facility was working with supernatural forces outside of their control.

You have been provided with a set of detectors that should be capable of detecting the byproduct of the forces that the facility was working with. Intelligence suggests that upon entering the facility is an open area to store vehicles followed by the housing for the workers. What follows after that is unknown.

It is theorized that the facility employed heavy security forces that are well equipped, so tread carefully.

Good luck.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Investigate what is going on in the facility

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
- Don't leave any witnesses.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: REDACTED

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Unknown
Location: Facility in the AO.

missions.name: In The Airwave
missions.summary: Contractors investigate a missing safety inspector checking on communication infrastructure

briefing.mission:
The Lybor Government has learned that the Russo-Lyborian Separatists are planning to disrupt communications infrastructure in the area.

An old radio building that has long been abandoned was scheduled for a routine check up by a local safety inspector.

The inspector has not been heard from in several hours, and a civilian call reported a gunshot in the area.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Check the area for any disruption near communications infrastructure in the marked area.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
Find and rescue the safety inspector.
briefing.situation:
Lybor has seen a rise in violence over the past few months.

Synixe has been contracted to combat the cell near the town of Kinney.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Lybor Government

The Lybor Government has been ramping up its efforts to combat rising extremists.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Russo-Lyborian Separatists
Location: Throughout Lybor

The Russo-Lyborian Separatists are a group of extremists that wish to see Lybor embrace Russian influence.
They have been known to use IEDs, VBIEDs, and other explosives to attack Lyborian Government forces.
They are outfitted with the latest Russian equipment and employ guerrilla tactics.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
The majority of civilians in the area do not support the Russo-Lyborian Separatists.
While some may have a friendly view of Russia, they do not support the rise in violence.

missions.name: Undeliverable
missions.summary: Contractors must intercept airdropped supplies before the enemy can hide them

briefing.mission:
The Russo-Lybor Separtists are preparing to receive a shipment of weapons from Russia.

We know they receive them via airdrop in the northern mountains, but we don't know the exact location.

Some possible locations have been marked in red, along with some known camp locations they've used in the past in yellow.

Intercept as many of the supplies as you can, take anything back to your base as you can, destroy the rest.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
Intercept and secure the weapons shipment, or destroy it if you cannot secure it.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
Disrupt any enemy camps you encounter

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
The use of a UAV may appear on the instruments of the aircraft performing the drop.
It is highly advised not to use a UAV until you are certain the drop has been made.

missions.name: Vigilant Watch
missions.summary: Contractors safeguard Pulau Monyet and its inhabitants from pirate threats

briefing.mission:
The Pulau government is preparing for a major sugarcane export operation from its eastern shores. To ensure the safety and security of the operation, a large portion of the Pulau National Police force has been deployed to the eastern coast, leaving other areas vulnerable to threats.

According an informant working for the Pulau Police, pirates with the help of revolutionaries, drawn by the reduced security presence, are planning a raid on this part of the island. He has provided intel that might be useful (available on the map). 

Synixe Contractors are tasked by the Pulau National Police to safeguard Pulau Monyet and its inhabitants from the pirate threat until the sugarcane shipments have been safely exported and the police forces can return to reinforce the northern part of the island.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Overwatch the northern coast of Pulau Monyet.
- Defend the AO until police arrives to reinforce.
briefing.situation:
Pulau has been a very peaceful place for the majority of its history. It's major export, sugarcane, has recently seen a global shortage, and Pulau has seen a rise in price for it's healthy but small supply.
As a result, organized crime has been on the rise, with various groups vying for control of the sugarcane trade. The Pulau National Police are struggling to keep up with the rise in crime, and have requested assistance.

<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Pulau National Police (Gendarmerie)
Location: Various large cities

The Pulau National Police is a small force that is responsible for maintaining law and order in the cities of Pulau. Their numbers are small, which has been fine until the recent rise in organized crime.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Various criminal groups
Location: Unknown

With new money flowing into Pulau, various people missing out on the sugarcane trade have turned to crime to make their money.

<font color='#139120'>INDEPENDENT FORCES</font>
Name: Nirwana Resort Security
Location: Nirwana, Tanjung

The resort at Nirwana has hired private security for the tourists that come to its resort. They have 5 checkpoints around the resort, and are armed with small arms.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Name: Sugarcane farmers
The sugarcane farmers have become the prime targets for the criminal groups. The crime ranges from petty theft to extortion, and the farmers are struggling to cope with the rise in crime.

Name: Tourists
Tourism is a small but lucrative industry in Pulau. The Nirwana Resort, which is completely private and encompases the towns of Tanjung and Nirwana, is the main tourist attraction.

Name: Farm owners
The farm owners are not always the ones farming the land, and some of the larger land owners have become targets for crime, or involved in the crime themselves.

missions.name: Break On Through
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with retaking industrial sites

briefing.mission:
Recently the Russo-Lyborian Separatists took over two industrial sites to the west of the region and are believed to be using them as staging points for further incursions into tows.

Synixe has been tasked with moving into and clearing the industrial sites, destroying any supplies that the enemies may have been gathering along the way.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Retake the industrial sites occupied by the enemy.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Destroy any supply caches you may find

missions.name: Hard Landing
missions.summary: Contractors recover a stolen shipment

briefing.mission:
At 0430 a helicopter that was leaving Gurun Airfield with a shipment of sugarcane was suddenly hit by a rocket and made a hard landing. Just mere seconds after, enemy forces swarmed the airfield taking workers prisoner and seizing the airfiled hoping to shoot down any other aerial vehicles that are loaded with sugarcane.

Local law enforcement immediatley blockadeded all roads leading up to the airfield in order to prevent civlians from approaching and to know if any of the culprits attend to get away through them; however they are unable to mount an assualt and have therefore asked Synixe to do so.

Contractors must first and foremost recover the sugarcane which was being transported in six metal cases, they may also attempt to retake the airfield, rescue any civilians and find the pilots that were in the helicopter.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Recover the stolen sugar cane shipment

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Retake the airfield from enemy forces
- Rescue any civlians that may have been taken prisoner
- Recover the body of the helicopter pilots

missions.name: Hit 'Em Up
missions.summary: Contractors retake the resort that was guarded by Theseus

briefing.mission:
Early in the morning the opposing force made a last ditch effort to try and make money in order to keep operating. They rushed the resort and town of Tanjung, killing any Theseus contractors they came across and are now holding the area for ransom. They expect the owner to pay, however the owner has decided to send us as a QRF to clear the area of any enemies.

Contractors must mobilize into the area and clear the resort and Tanjung of enemies, Theseus have also asked us to check the locations were their contractors were stationed and see if any of them are alive. Theseus had contractors staged in several checkpoints, and two men each in the resort and the town.

Intel indicates that the enemies have set up an AA emplacement in the AO, Theseus has offered to send some men in a helicopter to aid us in clearing Tanjung if we neutralize the AA.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Retake the resort and Tanjung.

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Destroy any AA in the area so that you may be reinforced by Theseus.
- Check Theseus positions for any survivors.

missions.name: Jungle Liberation
missions.summary: Contractors liberate civilian settlements

briefing.mission:
In the dead of night several criminal groups moved in and seized control of settlements in the islands of Selamat, Moko and Lepar; kicking out the population and obtaining control of their means of production.

Synixe is being sent in as a QRF and is tasked with clearing out these settlements so that the civilians can move back in.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Liberate the civlian settlements in Selamat, Moko and Lepar.

missions.name: Mister Postman
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with picking up sugarcane shipments

briefing.mission:
In order to keep the export of sugarcane going Synixe is being sent to make several pickups of sugarcane shipments from different towns that dedicate themselves to the production of it.

Contractors are tasked with going to Minanga, Lalomo, Apal and a small family run farm south east of Apal that doubles as an auto shop. There contractors are to pick up wooden crates, the correct crates will be marked by yellow flags on each side of them. The big tows are expected to have five crates each, while the small farm is expected to have only one.

Contractors will be provided with a HEMTT cargo truck to do the pickups, due to space distribution issues it is advised contractors load the smaller crate last but they can make more than one trip if they desire.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Pick up all of the shipments from the corresponding locations and return them to the HEMTT pickup location.

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
- Gendarmerie will be blocking the road south to prevent any enemy forces from approaching the convoy from that direction.

missions.name: Two Kinds Of Trouble
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with protecting foreign interests in the region

briefing.mission:
Recently the RLS have ramped up their efforts in disrupting foreign interests in the region. They have taken over several important sites on the south of the region and it is believed that they are going to destroy them.

Syinxe has been tasked with moving into the area, making sure that the sites are safe and disarming any explosives that the RLS may have planted in them.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Make sure that any infrastructure to the south is safe
